name: Coron Fever
description:
Game made in 48 hours from scratch for the Quarantine Game Jam.

The main symptom of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus is the overwhelming desire to travel.

Your role is to defend this airport, so the brainless horde won't callously infect the healthy among us.

Controls: WASD + left mouse

Tip: Pick up the ammo and hp boxes, so you can survive the 10 waves.

You know what to do next!!
